lead_paragraph: It's easy to see the passion in the Liverpool-Everton rivalry that ended in a 3-3 draw, but there is no excuse for the foul committed on Liverpool's biggest star, Luis Suárez.
snippet: It's easy to see the passion in the Liverpool-Everton rivalry that ended in a 3-3 draw, but there is no excuse for the foul committed on Liverpool's biggest star, Luis Suárez.
